attributes.action: Help Free Syrian Army by all means necessary to bring democracy & peace to Syria
attributes.additional_details: I would also call on them to request assistance from the likes of America, Turkey and Saudi Arabia and rid the world of an organisation that is the cause of so much suffering.Things such as the images of a dead child on a Beach should in fact be a rallying call to stop this sort of thing from happening to all 10 million people trapped within the territory now held by the self-proclaimed Islamic State and not just the lucky few who can make it to places like Europe.
attributes.background: The free Syrian army has must be given help and assistance.The UK government should contact the Free Syrian Army and offer assurance that we wish for the free and democratic society in Syria that they originally rebelled for as much as they do and will not support dictatorships of Assad or ISIS.
